Sinnertwin just barely rolls out of the way of the shot, as it incinerates
the earth where he lay. He transforms and pulls out his grenade launcher,
but before he can start a fire fight, a blast of powerful energy hits him
in the side, sending him flying. Another large blast can be heard, and the
same type of fusion energy rockets towards Rippersnapper.

Sinnertwin falls into a few trees a bit of a way off, and hits hard. His
body still smoking from the blast, but no real damage done to him.
